careerBackground: Previous to ANDigital I have built multiple high performing development teams across a number of different sectors. These have utilised Agile and Lean product development processes to create, deliver and scale enterprise level products. I have led complex web-builds of consumer facing systems for both start-ups and large corporations in media, gambling, mortgage comparison, commodity trade management and corporate social networking. I am passionate about technology and constantly strive to be at the forefront of the current social and digital age.
superHeroPower: My super power would be a hover skateboard that allows me to travel by jumping, grinding and flipping my way through the city with ultimate style.
